# Discord Chat Analysis for ğŸâ”‚issues Channel

## 1. Summary:
The chat primarily discusses server deployment and technical issues related to hosting multiple Hyperfy worlds. A user (0xLittle dog) is seeking advice on managing multiple worlds without the hassle of changing nginx and SSL configurations for each new world. Community members suggest using Coolify or other reverse proxies with auto SSL generation like Traefik as solutions.
